title: Fix missing photo/audio assets and enable autoplay background music

requirements.text: Add the 6 user-uploaded WhatsApp JPEG images as static frontend assets and ensure they load in production without 404s.

quotes: The user has uploaded 6 image(s): WhatsApp Image 2026-02-15 at 11.27.00 AM-1.jpeg, WhatsApp Image 2026-02-15 at 11.26.59 AM (2)-1.jpeg, WhatsApp Image 2026-02-15 at 11.26.58 AM-1.jpeg, WhatsApp Image 2026-02-15 at 11.26.59 AM-1.jpeg, WhatsApp Image 2026-02-15 at 11.26.58 AM (1)-1.jpeg, WhatsApp Image 2026-02-15 at 11.26.59 AM (1)-1.jpeg.

acceptanceCriteria: All 6 uploaded images are present under frontend/public/assets/photos/preloaded/ (or an equivalent public static directory) and are accessible by direct URL in production.
Loading the Photos section shows the preloaded gallery immediately (no user upload required) and does not display broken-image icons.
Browser console shows no 404 errors for any preloaded photo asset.

requirements.text: Update the preloaded gallery photo path list to match the exact filenames of the uploaded images (including the “-1” suffixes) so the site references the correct static assets.

quotes: include all these without any error

acceptanceCriteria: frontend/src/content/preloadedPhotos.ts references the exact filenames actually shipped in frontend/public/assets/photos/preloaded/.
The gallery renders all 6 photos in the slider/thumbnails without requiring URL encoding fixes by the user.

requirements.text: Remove the dedicated on-page Audio Section UI and replace it with background music that starts from the beginning and plays continuously in the background.

quotes: no need to put section for song it should be played on the background
song should be played from the beginig

acceptanceCriteria: There is no visible “Our Friendship Song” section in the main content.
Background audio begins at timestamp 0 when playback starts and continues playing as the user scrolls through the site.
If autoplay is blocked by the browser, the app starts playback immediately after the user’s first interaction (e.g., clicking “Open Your Birthday Gifts”), without showing a separate song section.

requirements.text: Bundle the friendship song audio file as a static frontend asset at the exact path used by the app and ensure the deployed production site can fetch it without errors.

quotes: song should be played from the beginig

acceptanceCriteria: An MP3 exists at frontend/public/assets/audio/tamil-friendship-song.mp3 and is fetchable in production (no 404).
Browser console shows no audio asset load errors, and playback succeeds once allowed by the browser’s autoplay policy.

requirements.text: Add a robust fallback so the Photos section always shows at least one valid image even if preloaded photos fail to load (use a locally bundled fallback image).

quotes: atleat include ghibli image or real photo

acceptanceCriteria: If any preloaded photo URL fails to load, the UI gracefully continues and still displays at least one image using a bundled fallback asset.
The Photos section never renders an empty/broken state solely due to missing preloaded assets.

requirements.text: Render any newly generated image assets as static files under frontend/public/assets/generated and reference them directly from the frontend (do not serve them through the backend).

quotes: atleat include ghibli image or real photo

acceptanceCriteria: Generated image files are placed in frontend/public/assets/generated.
The fallback image requirement (REQ-5) uses the generated asset via a direct /assets/generated/... URL.

constraints: Do not edit files under frontend/src/components/ui (read-only).
Do not edit frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts, frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.tsx, frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts, or frontend/src/main.tsx (immutable paths).
Keep the backend as a single Motoko actor; no new backend services.
nonGoals: Adding third-party audio streaming services or external CDNs for images/audio.
Implementing backend storage for uploaded photos/audio.
Adding a separate music player page/section or requiring the user to navigate to start music.

required: Anime-inspired watercolor birthday landscape illustration with warm pastel tones and soft film-grain texture (fallback-anime-watercolor.dim_1920x1080.png)
